long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the "Indiamart Lead Manager & Catalog View Extractor" extension, designed to offer significant advantages to sellers: This extension enables sellers to effortlessly download all customer inquiries (Leads) from IndiaMart Lead Manager & Catalog View into an Excel sheet with their contact numbers. With this tool, the sellers can efficiently gather comprehensive inquiry data into an Excel sheet.

Utilise Downloaded Excel sheet data for Bulk Messages and create contacts in vCard format on mobile devices.

This extension is tailored exclusively for sellers seeking to enhance productivity and streamline business operations.

Note: We are not using any type of personal data or security information of the seller. 

Sellers can contact us with our mobile number provided within the extension for assistance. We assure sellers of 100% data security.

Thank you for considering our extension!
